thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 14 of 265
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: After a month of meal delivery, my experience has been great. Creative recipes that are typically prepared in 30 minutes. The service saves me a lot of time at the grocery store and hunting for recipes. As single person, I found myself wasting a lot of food so the pre-portioned ingredients are perfect when cooking for one. At first, I thought the cost was high but I'm saving money by not throwing away food. Added bonus, I've learned a few new cooking techniques. I definitely recommend this service to professionals looking to add some convenience and eat healthier.
